entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 9.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h this evening except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
